name: Kp (Minute)
description: Minute-by-minute Kp history for the last 6 hours
notes: When calling this module from the top-level endpoing (`/v2`), the key is literally `kp.minute`. It is NOT an array (e.g. `{ "kp": { "minute": {} } }`)

returns.description: The Kp reading for the given `date`

demo.name: Get Kp Minute Data
demo.description: Gets all Kp readings for the last 6 hours. Note how `minute` is NOT a property of `kp`. The key is literally `kp.minute`
